title: mArgam kATTIp-pinnar
sahitya:
mArgam kATTip-pinnar marai mukham koNDa marmam yAdayyA maithili ramaNA


anupallavi

  Arkkum kaDal shUzh ambuvi tarum bhOgam aravE turandun padamE pera san


caraNam    oru tAran oru bANan oru vArtaiyinanenrum sharaNAgatar tamaik-kAkkum vratanenrum
 marai pOTriDum uyar marakatavaNNA un urukkANa uLLam Engum enranukku
